change.changenote: Section 1 definition of "minister" BEFORE amended by BC Reg 4/2010, effective January 14, 2010.

definition.def: means the Minister of Education, and includes any person designated by that minister;

change.changenote: Section 3 (1) BEFORE amended by BC Reg 165/2010, effective July 1, 2010.

subsection.subsectiontext: Within 14 days after a Notice to Mediate has been delivered under section 2, or, if a disputant has commenced an action in the Supreme Court in relation to a dispute, within 14 days after the originating process in that action is first served on a disputant, the participants must jointly appoint a mutually acceptable mediator.

change.changenote: Section 9 BEFORE amended by BC Reg 64/2021, effective March 11, 2021.

bcl:section.bcl:text: The mediator may conduct the mediation in any manner he or she considers appropriate to assist the participants to reach a resolution that is timely, fair and cost-effective.
